TextBody:
Hello,

Can you please disable "Advanced Printer and MTP Scanning:" option for the computer and confirm if the issue remains.

If this resolves it and you need the "Advanced Printer and MTP Scanning:" option to be enabled we can add the CiscoVPN (Cisco Secure Client) processname to an exception.

If the issue remains, please take a screenshot of the DPI settings.

Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
